scripts.test: node functions/__tests__/llm-client.google.test.js && node functions/__tests__/llm-client.retry.test.js && node functions/__tests__/generateInsights.integration.test.js && node functions/__tests__/generateInsights.fallback.test.js && node functions/__tests__/advisory-utils.test.js && node functions/__tests__/prompt-builder.test.js && node functions/__tests__/weather.cache.test.js
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build && npx netlify-cli deploy --dir=frontend/dist --prod --message "Deploy from local"
